name: Abandoned Cars
description:
You lost your car a long time ago. You want it back.

Abandoned Cars is a simple game about walking along the highway and listening to stories about lives that aren't your own. It is a 3D story-driven game that takes less than 10 minutes to complete. Turn your sound on for the full experience. 

All models were downloaded from the asset store. Please let me know if you encounter any bugs.

Thank you for taking the time to play Abandoned Cars!
